Bateshwor (Nepali: बटेश्वर ) is a municipality in Danusha District in Province No. 2 of Nepal. It was formed in 2016 occupying current 5 sections (wards) from previous 5 VDCs. It occupies an area of 31.66 km2 with a total population of 21,530.
